rules.description: M — tap = m; hold = ⌘⌥⌃⇧F20; tap-tap-hold = ⌃⇧M (variable/timer style)
CAPS - - - HSLAUNCHER (alone), HYPER (alone), SUPER (with shift), MEH (with ctrl)
GLOBAL - A -  - - RaycastAI hotkey (super+A) on hold
GLOBAL - C -  - - hold for OCR via CSX
GLOBAL - D -  - - Quick format date on hold
GLOBAL - F -  - - hold to search with ProFind
GLOBAL - G -  - - ChatGPT hotkey (super+G) when held
GLOBAL - H -  - - hold for Hammerspoon console
GLOBAL - I -  - - hold for indent line

to_if_held_down.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/hs -c 'local ev=require("hs.eventtap"); local t=require("hs.timer"); ev.keyStroke({}, "home"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "tab"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "end")'

rules.description: GLOBAL - Q -  - - hold for QSpace Pro
GLOBAL - R -  - - hold for latest Download
GLOBAL - S -  - - hold for RaycastAI hotkey
GLOBAL - W -  - - hold for Writing Tools (Cmd+Shift+w)
GLOBAL - / - - - hold to search for files
GLOBAL - ⌃⌥ESC - - - Activity Monitor (tap) or Force Quit (tap-tap)
GLOBAL - Mac OSX: Use Function Keys in Supported Apps, else use Media Keys
